title: Biodiesel production through transesterification of waste Pistacia- Terebinthus Oil by pharmaceutical waste as a heterogeneous catalyst: A sustainable solution for reducing external costs
content:
Publication date: 30 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 14

Author(s): Saman Rashidi, Ramin Tahmasebi-Boldaji, Aref Ahmadian Baghbadarani, Majid Baghdadi, Omid Tavakoli, Abdolreza Karbassi, Akram Avami
